content: --आसनं {1} half a seat; अर्धासनं गोत्रभिदोधितष्ठौ <ls>R. 6. 73</ls>; मम हि दिवौकसां समक्षमर्धासनोपवेशितस्य <ls>Ś. 7</ls> (it being considered a mark of very great respect to make room for a guest &c. on the same seat with oneself). {2} greeting kindly or with great respect. {3} exemption from censure.
